verses.name: Acts 21:21
verses.text: And they are informed of thee, that thou teachest all the Jews which are among the Gentiles to forsake Moses, saying that they ought not to circumcise their children, neither to walk after the customs.

verses.name: Acts 21:22
verses.text: What is it therefore? the multitude must needs come together: for they will hear that thou art come.

verses.name: Acts 21:23
verses.text: Do therefore this that we say to thee: We have four men which have a vow on them;
